website_summaries.verdict: Flintstones fans of all ages will love assembling this perfectly designed LEGO set, which perfectly captures the old-school charm of the classic cartoon.
pros: Build the Flintstones’ iconic stone home, primitive décor, and foot-powered car
Includes Fred, Wilma, Barney, and Betty figures
Car sports fabric roof and dinosaur rib accessory

customer_reviews.title: Yabadabadoo lego!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set only a little disappointed that bam bam, pebbles and Dino were removed since the original lego idea had them
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Vilaplana

customer_reviews.title: Super cool throwback
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used to watch the Flintstones when we were kids. This was a perfect gift! It wasn't an "easy" to assemble set. Pretty challenging and had to start over once. One damn piece off and well you know. Anywho, great addition to any Lego collection or just a challenging puzzle to complete. Fun stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Wheres dino?
customer_reviews.text: Fun to build the flintstone home, but where's dino? Look at the tv... Would like another set or two
customer_reviews.author: superego

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. . No missing parts  !!
customer_reviews.text: An enjoyable project to assemble. It's now been added to my S-gauge toy train layout. :)
customer_reviews.author: John T Philpot

customer_reviews.title: If you are a flintstones fan this one is a no brainer get it you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Fun kit to put together bags are #1-6 and follow instructions in the book , start with bag 1 when it’s empty next step bag #2 and so on and so forth. Took me about 4hrs to finish,would have been nice to see bam-bam,pebbles and Dino well at least Dino included in the set, but overall a great set a lot of detail.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. KOENIG

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great for nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: I am a BIG LEGO fan and watched the Flinstones a lot as a child. When this came out, I knew I had to had it, and I finally bit the bullet and bought it! It's an easy build, love the minifigs, but only wish that Dino was in here - that would have made it so much better. Love that the 'car' can actually move! This is one of the better Lego sets out there!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Travels

customer_reviews.title: yabba dabba doo
customer_reviews.text: as a child in the early 80 s I grow up with the Flinstones, this set is awesome, very well done and it looks better in real than the pictures, so if you are a fan of Lego and also a Flinstones fan, this is a must buy without doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Avila Arquin

customer_reviews.title: You need to own this set if you loved THE FLINTSTONES!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this modestly priced Lego set, my son and I put it together in one evening. This set will definitely be a collector's item in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Helen MeredithHM

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun, retro kit
customer_reviews.text: It does turn out to be a bit smaller than you'd think from the parts...but a super kit. It's so retro and completely like the series. It doesn't have Dino as a character. But cleverly, the tv in the living room has "Dino Missing" on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: MKRacing66

customer_reviews.title: WILMA
customer_reviews.text: I love legos. These are cool looks great. Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Eva M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set! Perfect for my retro child. Really cute set up that reminds you of how their house would look! 12 year old had no problem putting it together.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with The Flintstones And this is a good set

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest lego set. Love the details it has. Was so much fun to build. Brought back a lot of childhood memories of watching the Flintstones growing up.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun building this! Organized the pieces in two ice trays and then went to building. Lots of cool building techniques are used to build this great LEGO set that works very well as a display piece.

customer_reviews.title: LEGO FLINTSTONE BUILDING SET
customer_reviews.text: The Flintstone Lego was purchased as a gift for my Step dad's Birthday. He loved it and had it built in one day with one left hand. He had a stroke in 2008.

product_meta.title: LEGO Ideas 21316 The Flintstones Building Kit (748 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Enjoy modern stone age Suburban life in bedrock with this LEGO Ideas 21316 the Flintstones collectible building toy! A wonderfully nostalgic building toy, It features the Flintstones house and their iconic family car. The detailed house has a removable roof for easy play, an opening front door, sofa, TV, coffee table, bowling ball and bowling pin elements, plus a green garden baseplate with a buildable palm tree. Build your own Flintstones car that seats 4 minifigures and features a new fabric car roof element and an attachable dinosaur rib for creative play. The first animated TV series ever to be aired in a prime-time slot, The Flintstones cartoon was first broadcast in America in 1960 and has become an enduring family favorite around the world. Recreate hilarious scenes with the included cartoon character minifigures of Fred Flintstone, wife Wilma Flintstone and their friends Barney and Betty Rubble, or simply build and display this instant classic LEGO ideas model.
feature_bullets: Build the Flintstones home Featuring a removable roof, Sofa, TV, coffee table, buildable palm tree and postbox, plus a family car with an attachable dinosaur rib, then enjoy modern stone age life!
This model kit includes 4 new The Flintstones cartoon character minifigures: Fred Flintstone, Wilma Flintstone, barney Rubble and Betty Rubble
The Flintstones home Measures over 4” (12cm) high, 6” (16cm) wide and 4” (12cm) deep; The Flintstones vehicle measures over 2” (6cm) high, 4” (11cm) long and 2” (7cm) wide

748 pieces – cool toy building set for boys and girls aged 10+ and for fans and big kids of all ages; This LEGO ideas 21316 the Flintstones collectible construction toy can be built together with all other original LEGO building toys and LEGO bricks for creative play
Build and display or recreate hilarious scenes from the classic 1960S American animated TV series the Flintstones with this nostalgic toy
